NRC Office of Public Engagement and Participation Act of 2023
To establish an Office of Public Engagement and Participation within the Nuclear Regulatory Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy, Climate and Grid Security.

bill.summary:
NRC Office of Public Engagement and Participation Act of 2023
This bill establishes an independent office within the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) to advocate for the public within NRC jurisdiction and support public participation in NRC proceedings and activities.
